assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Yamazen Corporation provides production equipment, housing equipment/materials, and home products worldwide. The company offers machine tools, such as FMS and FMC, industrial robots, machining centers, CNC grinding and CNC milling machines, electrical discharge machines, , lamination devices, measuring and automation peripheral equipment, machine tool accessories, conventional machine tools, injection molding and laser processing machines, other metal sheet forming and processing machines, etc.; industrial tools and equipment, including packing/wrapping equipment, automated warehousing equipment, picking/sorter systems, robot and CAD systems, motor/power train, hydraulic/pneumatic equipment, laborsaving equipment, automation equipment, etc.; and home appliances, interiors, exteriors, gardening and outdoor products, healthcare and sanitary goods, industrial tools, car parts, etc. The company also provides building materials, including kitchen, cooking, bathroom, washbasin, and sanitary appliances; water boiling, air conditioning and ventilation, water heating, office and home, nursing care, and construction equipment; window and structural building frames; and plumbing equipment and materials. In addition, it offers sales promotion, event, PR, media advertising, marketing, housing magazine publication, and consulting services; accident/life insurance agency services; and warehousing and tour services. Further, the company engages in editing, producing, and printing various publications, including corporate information magazines, catalogues, corporate manuals, and anniversary booklets; marketing and research works; and planning and supporting seminars and exhibitions, as well as operates an internet portal site for MRO goods. It also acts as solutions advisor to support manufacturing; and offers support services for design, installation of machine tools, and maintenance after installation. The company was incorporated in 1947 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.
